channel.title: Sponsered servers
channel.description: I have noticed you haven't filled all 10 spots on your sponsered server's this month. I have listed my bid in the correct section and was hoping to get in this month since you havn't filled all the spots yet, but my bid has yet to be viewed. Any chance that i could slide in for this month?

item.title: Sponsered servers
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

We just review them when it gets close to the new month.

Read full topic

item.title: Sponsered servers
item.dc:creator: @Rile0120 Rile0120
item.description:
@Rile0120 wrote:

Who knows lol, but that’s time that he lost on advertising his server and it was his fault.

One more quick thing. I know i remember seeing it some where but i posted my bid in the correct topic and on the result page it says it usually takes 24-48 hours for your bid to be reviewed. Well mine has been up there more than 48 hours. Do you just do reviewing when it gets close to a new month or anytime?

Thanks

Read full topic
